data.lore: Skarner, the crystalline guardian, defends the entrance to a realm deep beneath the Shuriman wastes. The few who survive trespassing his domain describe a creature of terrifying intelligence, anger, and precision. What this merciless creature protects, no one knows.
data.name: Skarner
data.title: the Crystal Vanguard

spells.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds and gains {{ e8 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e9 }} seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Basic attacks lower Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.5 seconds. Double effect when attacking champions.
spells.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage. Whenever he hits a target with Crystal Slash he gains a stacking buff that increases his Attack Speed for a few seconds. Basic attack reduce this ability's cooldown.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Skarner deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds and gains {{ e8 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e9 }} seconds, stacking up to 3 times. While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Basic attacks lower Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.5 seconds. Double effect when attacking champions.
spells.name: Crystal Slash
spells.sanitizedDescription: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage. Whenever he hits a target with Crystal Slash he gains a stacking buff that increases his Attack Speed for a few seconds. Basic attack reduce this ability's cooldown.

spells.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains {{ e5 }}% increased Movement Speed that ramps up over 3 seconds.
spells.description: Skarner gains a shield, and while the shield persists his Movement Speed is increased.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains {{ e5 }}% increased Movement Speed that ramps up over 3 seconds.
spells.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
spells.sanitizedDescription: Skarner gains a shield, and while the shield persists his Movement Speed is increased.

spells.tooltip: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit and slows them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.
spells.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit and slows them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.
spells.name: Fracture
spells.sanitizedDescription: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them.

spells.tooltip:
Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for {{ e1 }} seconds and deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Impale consumes all stacks of Crystal Venom on the target and deals {{ e3 }} magic damage for each stack consumed.
spells.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals magic damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt additional damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for {{ e1 }} seconds and deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Impale consumes all stacks of Crystal Venom on the target and deals {{ e3 }} magic damage for each stack consumed.
spells.name: Impale
spells.sanitizedDescription: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals magic damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt additional damage.

passive.name: Crystallizing Sting
passive.description:
Skarner's damaging spells apply Crystal Venom to enemies for 5 seconds that stacks up to 3 times.

If an enemy has 3 stacks of Crystal Venom, Skarner's next attack will deal additional magic damage and stun the target. Skarner cannot apply Crystal Venom to this target for 6 seconds after he stuns them.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Skarner's damaging spells apply Crystal Venom to enemies for 5 seconds that stacks up to 3 times. If an enemy has 3 stacks of Crystal Venom, Skarner's next attack will deal additional magic damage and stun the target. Skarner cannot apply Crystal Venom to this target for 6 seconds after he stuns them.
